profile:
Stonex is a premier fabricator of kitchen counter tops, bathroom vanity tops, jacuzzi and fireplace surrounds, as well as other products for residential and commercial applications. Visit our large showroom with 1,000's of full-size slabs on-site.

With over 70,000 kitchen countertops installed throughout Ontario and over 25+ years of experience, Stonex Granite & Quartz Inc. is the leader in manufacturing and installation of natural stone products with the quickest turnaround time.

Come visit one of our 3 showrooms in Woodstock, Cambridge or Stoney Creek!
service_area: Cambridge, Stratford, Kitchener, Guelph, Waterloo, Milton, Mississauga, Rockwood, Georgetown
products: Granite, Quartz, Marble, Soapstone, Porcelain and Exotic Countertops and Surrounds
services: Fabricator and installer of stone surfaces.
brands: ST Quartz, Lavanti, Ceasarstone, Cambria, Silestone
specialities: Southern Ontario's #1 custom countertop and stone company
